import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

# Create a sample dataset
data = pd.DataFrame({
    'x': np.random.rand(100),
    'y': np.random.rand(100)
})

# Create a scatter plot
plt.scatter(data['x'], data['y'])
plt.title('Scatter Plot')
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.show()
